meanings.definition: A region in northwestern Canada where gold was discovered in the late 19th century.
meanings.sent1: The miners traveled to the Klondike in search of gold.
meanings.sent2: Many people dream of visiting the Klondike to explore its history.
meanings.sent3: When the explorer found a map to the Klondike, he couldn't contain his excitement.
meanings.sent4: The Klondike gleamed with the promise of hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: Legends of the Klondike's riches spread far and wide.

meanings.definition: A type of solitaire card game.
meanings.sent1: During the long winter nights, she enjoyed playing Klondike on her computer.
meanings.sent2: Klondike is a popular card game that requires strategy and patience.
meanings.sent3: His high score in Klondike made him the envy of his friends.
meanings.sent4: The challenge of Klondike kept her entertained for hours.
meanings.sent5: Winning at Klondike always brought a sense of accomplishment.

meanings.definition: A type of ice cream bar.
meanings.sent1: On a hot summer day, nothing beats a refreshing Klondike treat.
meanings.sent2: Kids love to indulge in a Klondike after playing outside.
meanings.sent3: She couldn't resist the temptation of a Klondike on a stick.
meanings.sent4: The creamy center of a Klondike is a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent5: The chocolate coating on a Klondike adds a delicious crunch.
